system.description: You can come to others in dreams, conveying the word of your faith. You always have the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.jo2vztvypvhqxh5u]{Dream} spell prepared, and it is considered a cleric spell for you. You can cast it as part of taking a long rest without using material components or a spell slot. When you cast the spell in this way, you must be the messenger and cannot terrorize the target.
